item.description:
关键问题：特朗普在任何时候都在听谁说话，他的精神状态如何？【原文：

item.title: 日本资产吸引创纪录资金流入，表明资金正撤离美国
item.description: 日本债券和股票将创下有史以来最大的月度外资流入记录，这进一步表明全球资金正在寻求美国资产的替代品。【原文：Japanese bonds and stocks are set to draw the biggest combined monthly foreign inflows on record, adding to signs global funds are seeking alternatives to US assets.】

item.title: <strong>澳大利亚大选投资者指南</strong
item.description: 不错过任何一集。立即关注 The Bloomberg Australia Podcast。【原文：Never miss an episode. Follow The Bloomberg Australia Podcast today.】

item.title: 随着需求放缓，中国液化天然气进口量下滑趋势将延续至四月
item.description: 与一年前相比，中国本月的液化天然气进口量将下降 20% 以上，全球最大的液化天然气买家的购买量下滑趋势将进一步扩大。【原文：China’s imports of liquefied natural gas are set to fall by more than 20% this month compared with a year ago, extending a slump in purchases by the world’s biggest buyer of the fuel.】

item.title: 尽管美元反弹，外汇交易员仍坚持看跌美元的押注
item.description: 在美元连续两天反弹之后，外汇交易员们正努力守住看跌美元的头寸。【原文：Foreign exchange traders are battling to hold onto their bearish dollar positions after the currency’s two-day rally.】

item.title: 越南与美国启动贸易谈判，飞机交易逐渐成形
item.description: 越南和美国就特朗普政府威胁对来自东南亚国家的商品征收 46% 关税的问题正式启动谈判，越南正在争分夺秒地利用 90 天的暂缓征税期。【原文：Vietnam and the US officially kicked off talks over the Trump administration’s threatened 46% tariff on goods from the Southeast Asian nation, which is racing to take advantage of a 90-day reprieve on the levy.】

item.title: 印度技术指标转为看涨，基准量表连涨七天
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 杰富瑞的伍德称美股最佳状态已过，预计将出现更多下跌
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc）的克里斯托弗-伍德（Christopher Wood）认为，美国股市已经过了最好的时期，投资者应该做好美国股市、国债和美元进一步下跌的准备。【原文：The US stock market is well past its best days and investors should be prepared to see further declines in the nation’s equities, Treasury bonds as well as the dollar, according to Christopher Wood of Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 摩根大通将菲律宾股票上调至 "增持"，称其为 "赢家
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发全球动荡之际，摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. upgraded Philippine equities to overweight from neutral as a “relative winner” amid the global turmoil unleashed by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 印度科技股涨势不惧全球贸易战引发的风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战正在增加印度软件服务出口商盈利下调的几率。推动这些公司股票上涨的投资者可能会忽视风险，自作自受。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade wars are increasing the odds of earnings downgrades for India’s bellwether software services exporters. Investors driving their stocks higher may be ignoring the risks at their own peril.】

item.title: 美国官员酝酿放松针对汽车业的关税
item.description: 特朗普政府正在考虑是否降低某些针对汽车行业的关税，汽车制造商高管曾警告说，这将严重打击汽车行业的利润和就业。【原文：The Trump administration is considering whether to reduce certain tariffs targeting the auto industry that carmaker executives have warned would deal a severe blow to profits and jobs.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为现在是投资中国房地产股票的 "好时机
item.description: 花旗集团策略师呼吁投资者建立中国房地产股票仓位，因为政策支持和更好的管理方法有望提高该行业的盈利能力。【原文：Citigroup Inc. strategists called on investors to build positions in Chinese property stocks, as policy support and better management practices are expected to improve the sector’s profitability.】

item.title: 瑞银放弃长期看跌印度的观点，下调香港评级
item.description: 鉴于全球贸易的不确定性，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）放弃了长期以来看跌印度股市的观点，将印度股市的评级从 "减持 "上调至 "中性"。【原文：UBS Group AG is abandoning its long-held bearish view on Indian stocks, upgrading the market to neutral from underweight as it realigns its strategy given global trade uncertainties.】

item.title: 日本商业服务价格在关税到来之前持续走高
item.description: 在日本央行准备于下周制定政策之际，日本企业的服务价格在上个月保持高位，这表明在美国关税影响生效之前，通胀压力仍在持续。【原文：Service prices among businesses in Japan stayed elevated last month, indicating sustained inflationary pressures before the impact from US tariffs kicks in, as the Bank of Japan prepares to set policy next week.】

item.title: 特朗普更趋和解引发黄金大幅下跌后黄金上涨
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普总统就贸易战和美联储发表的更为温和的言论推动，黄金在经历了五个月来的最大跌幅后有所上涨。【原文：Gold gained after its steepest decline in five months that was driven by President Donald Trump’s more conciliatory comments on the trade war and the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 特朗普抨击货币操纵可能导致韩元走强
item.description: 如果韩元被纳入本周四开始的亚洲国家与美国官员之间的贸易谈判，那么韩元可能会有一些上涨空间。【原文：South Korea’s won may have some upside if the currency is included in trade talks between officials from the Asian country and the US starting Thursday.】

item.title: 关税威胁经济，中国将启动特别债券销售
item.description: 中国将于本周四发行本年度首批特别主权债券，这是中国政府宣布的刺激措施的一部分，目的是缓解与美国一触即发的贸易紧张局势所带来的打击。【原文：China is set to issue the first batch of special sovereign bonds for the year on Thursday as part of the stimulus announced by authorities to soften the blow from simmering trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 关税冲击令增长前景黯淡，马来西亚降息押注升温
item.description: 投资者越来越期待东南亚最后一个拒绝降息的国家马来西亚能够屈服于全球贸易战日益加剧的经济压力。【原文：Investors increasingly expect Malaysia, Southeast Asia’s last holdout against interest rate cuts, to give in to mounting economic pressure from the global trade war.】

item.title: 石油保持两周来最大跌幅，欧佩克+供应成焦点
item.description: 由于投资者权衡了欧佩克+增加供应的前景和中美贸易紧张局势的影响，石油创下两周来的最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest loss in two weeks as investors weighed the prospect of more supply from OPEC+ and the fallout from trade tensions between the US and China.】

item.title: 日本央行观察家预计加息将推迟，终端利率将降低
item.description: 彭博社的一项调查显示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税措施令经济前景暗淡之后，日本央行的观察家们预测日本央行将推迟加息，并在加息周期结束时降低利率水平。【原文：Bank of Japan watchers forecast a delay in interest-rate hikes and a lower level at the end of the cycle after US President Donald Trump’s tariff measures darkened the economic outlook, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 中国农民与早期天气威胁作斗争，贸易限制带来压力
item.description: 在贸易冲突阻碍中国进口之际，中国主要农业地区的干旱和暴雨提前引发了人们对农作物的担忧。【原文：Dry spells and heavy rains in key Chinese farming regions are raising early concerns over crops, at a time when trade conflicts are hampering the country’s imports.】

item.title: 英国斥资 3 亿英镑打造海上风电供应链
item.description: 英国将拨出 3 亿英镑（约合 3.98 亿美元）的专款，用于加强离岸风能的本土供应链。【原文：The UK is earmarking £300 million ($398 million) to bolster the homegrown supply chain for offshore wind, an industry considered essential for meeting climate and job-growth goals.】

item.title: 政治动荡抑制需求，韩国经济萎缩
item.description: 韩国经济在第一季度出现萎缩，凸显出商业活动的脆弱状态，甚至在出口商还没有完全承受唐纳德-特朗普的惩罚性进口关税之前就已经如此。【原文：South Korea’s economy contracted in the first quarter, underscoring the fragile state of business activity even before exporters absorbed the full force of Donald Trump’s punitive import duties.】

item.title: 人工智能蓬勃发展，英伟达供应商 SK 海力士盈利超预期
item.description: 由于美国关税引发的对贸易中断的担忧促使全球企业囤积用于个人电脑和智能手机的先进芯片和内存，SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：SK Hynix Inc. earned better-than-expected quarterly profit after US tariff-induced fears of trade disruptions pushed companies around the world to stock up on both advanced chips and memory used in PCs and smartphones.】

item.title: Lyft 首次开始调度出租车以减少等待时间
item.description: Lyft 公司将从下月开始为部分美国乘客派遣标准出租车，这是该公司为与规模更大的竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. will begin dispatching standard taxis to some US riders starting next month in a first as it expands its features to compete with much-larger rival Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普释放缓和对华立场信号，股市上涨：市场综述
item.description: 有迹象表明，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在重新考虑其在贸易和美联储问题上的激进立场，全球股市和长期国债上涨，避险资产回落。【原文：Global equities and long-dated Treasuries rose while havens retreated on signs US President Donald Trump is rethinking the most-aggressive elements of his combative stances on trade and the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 美联储哈马克认为扩大资产负债表需要付出代价
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）表示，放慢美国央行缩减资产负债表的步伐可能会让官员们在更长的时间内继续缩减资产负债表，同时强调持有超过必要规模的资产组合是有成本的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack said slowing the pace of the US central bank’s balance-sheet reduction may allow officials to continue the runoff for longer, while emphasizing there are costs to holding a portfolio that is larger than necessary.】

item.title: 世界顶级金矿公司纽蒙特的成本达到十年来最高水平
item.description: 纽蒙特公司公布了至少九年来最高的季度成本，部分原因是其在澳大利亚最大金矿之一的运营。【原文：Newmont Corp. posted its highest quarterly costs in at least nine years, in part because of its operations at one of Australia’s largest gold mines.】

item.title: WeightWatchers 准备在几周内申请破产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，WW 国际公司在与大多数贷款人达成债务重组协议后，正准备在几周内申请破产。【原文：WW International Inc. is preparing to file for bankruptcy within weeks after reaching a debt-restructuring deal with a majority of its lenders, according to people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 斗牛士公司计划减少钻井活动，到 2025 年中期减少一个钻井平台
item.description: 得克萨斯州页岩油公司 Matador Resources Co. 计划在今年年中之前减少九个钻井平台中的一个，以应对原油价格暴跌。【原文：Texas shale-oil company Matador Resources Co. plans to drop one of its nine drilling rigs by the middle of the year in response to plunging crude prices.】
